Detailed Description

Basic math functions.

Definition in file rs_cl.rsh.

_RS_RUNTIME float sign ( float  v)

if (v < 0) return -1.f; else if (v > 0) return 1.f; else return 0.f;

Supports 1,2,3,4 components
